comments: I took Russia Today with Professor Salmanova and absolutely loved it. It was an online course, but I feel she prompted me to take initiative and learn a lot. She\'s very helpful and always prompt in answering any questions (and in returning your grades!)

If you are serious about learning Russian please take this class. Otherwise don\'t come near this patient, understanding, and hard-working woman. She is just personally GREAT- in need of great praise and reward. If you come to every class and study somewhat even if you have a hard time she\'ll cut you a little slack because she appreciates effort.

Love this teacher, she is understanding if you are absent, and finds time to make sure she can meet with you to go over anything, she is always willing to work with the students. Really is just fantastic
Not a very understanding Professor. Very difficult to work with, would not recommend taking this class if you have a life, family, or job out side of school
